General.Name: Zhejiang Chenfeng Science and Technology Co Ltd Class A
General.Description: Zhejiang Chenfeng Technology Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells lighting products in China. The company offers LED bulb light radiators, lamp holders, lamp fittings, LED bulb PC covers, downlights, spotlights, and aluminum substrates. It also exports its products to Germany, France, the United States, India, and internationally. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Haining, China.
